-----------------dayofweek(Q1)----------------------------------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication23
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            string a=Console.ReadLine();
            string b=UserProgramCode.getDay(a);
            Console.WriteLine(b);
            Console.ReadLine();

        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static string getDay(string a)
        {
            string c=" ";
            DateTime dt;
          
          if (DateTime.TryParseExact(a, "MM-dd-yyyy", null, System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None, out dt))
                c = dt.DayOfWeek.ToString();
            return c;
           
 
        }
    }
}

------------------------Reverse and Format(Q2)--------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication23
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            string a = Console.ReadLine();
            char c = char.Parse(Console.ReadLine());
            string b = UserProgramCode.reshape(a, c);
            Console.WriteLine(b);
            Console.ReadLine();

            
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static string reshape(string a,char c)
        {
            string f = " ";
            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
            char[] ch = a.ToCharArray();
            Array.Reverse(ch);
            for (int i = 0; i < ch.Length; i++)
            {
                sb.Append(ch[i]);
                sb.Append(c);
            }
            f=sb.ToString();
            f = f.Substring(0,(f.Length-1));
            return f;
 
        }
    }
}

--------------------------List the Elements - A (Q3)-----------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication23
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n=Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            List<int> li =new List<int>(n);
            List<int> lj=new List<int>();
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            {
                li.Add(Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine()));
            }
          	
              		 
          	
            int m=Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            lj=UserProgramCode.FtElements(li,m);
            if (lj[0] == -1)
                Console.WriteLine("no elements");
            else
            {
                foreach (int j in lj)
                {
                    Console.WriteLine(j);
                }
            }
            Console.ReadLine();
            
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static List<int> FtElements(List<int> li,int b)
        {
            
            int f = 0;
            List<int> lk = new List<int>();
            for (int i = 0; i < li.Count; i++)
            {
                if (li[i] < b)
                {
                    
                    lk.Add(li[i]);
                    f = 1;

                }
                
            }
            
           
            if (f == 0)
            {
                lk.Add(-1);

 
            }
            return lk;
            
        }
    }
}

----------------------Finding common Elements in multiples of 3 (Q4)-----------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication7
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n1 = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            List<int> l1 = new List<int>(n1);
            for (int i = 0; i < n1; i++)
            {
                l1.Add(Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine()));
            }

            int n2 = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            List<int> l2 = new List<int>(n2);
            for (int i = 0; i < n2; i++)
            {
                l2.Add(Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine()));
            }

            int n3 = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            List<int> l3 = new List<int>(n3);
            for (int i = 0; i < n3; i++)
            {
                l3.Add(Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine()));
            }
            List<int> l4 = new List<int>();
            l4 = UserProgramCode.FindCommonElements(l1, l2, l3);
            if (l4[0] == 0)
                Console.WriteLine("No match found");
            else if (l4[0] == -1)
                Console.WriteLine("The list contains negative values");
            else if (l4[0] == -2)
                Console.WriteLine("The elements of the list should be less than or equal to 500");
            else
            {
                foreach (int f in l4)
                {
                    Console.WriteLine(f);
                }
            }
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static List<int> FindCommonElements(List<int> l1, List<int> l2, List<int> l3)
        {
            int f = 0;
            List<int> l5 = new List<int>();
            List<int> l6 = new List<int>();
            for (int i = 0; i < l1.Count; i++)
            {
                for (int j = 0; j < l2.Count; j++)
                {
                    for (int k = 0; k < l3.Count; k++)
                    {
                        if (l1[i] < 0 || l2[j] < 0 || l3[k] < 0)
                        {
                            l6.Add(-1);

                        }
                        else if (l1[i] > 500 || l2[j] > 500 || l3[k] > 500)
                        {
                            l6.Add(-2);

                        }

                        else if (l1[i] == l2[j])
                        {
                            if (l1[i] == l3[k])
                            {
                                l5.Add(l1[i]);
                                f = 1;
                            }
                        }
                    }

                }
            }
            if (f == 0)
                l6.Add(0);
            else
            {
                foreach (int e in l5)
                {
                    if (e % 3 == 0)
                        l6.Add(e);
                }
            }
            return l6;

        }
    }
}
-------------------------Calculate Cost(Q5)-----------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication7
{
    class program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            char c1 = Convert.ToChar(Console.ReadLine());
            char c2 = Convert.ToChar(Console.ReadLine());
            int n1 = UserProgramCode.calculateCost(n, c1, c2);
            if (n1 == -1)
                Console.WriteLine("Too low cost");
            else if (n1 == -2)
                Console.WriteLine("Invalid type of flower");
            else if (n1 == -3)
                Console.WriteLine("Invalid decoration type");
            else
                Console.WriteLine(n1);
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }

    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static int calculateCost(int n,char c1,char c2)
        {
            int cost;
            if (!(c2 == 'S' || c2 == 'C'))
                return -3;
            else if (!(c1 == 'N' || c1 == 'E'))
                return -2;
            else
            {
                if (c2 == 'S')
                {
                    if (c1 == 'N')
                        cost = n * 400 + 15000;
                    else
                        cost = n * 700 + 15000;
                }
                else
                {
                    if (c1 == 'N')
                        cost = n * 400 + 25000;
                    else
                        cost = n * 700 + 25000;
                }
 
            }

            if (cost < 20000)
                return -1;
            else
                return cost; 
 
            

 
        }
    }
}
---------------------Replace string(Q6)----------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication26
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            string str = Console.ReadLine();
            int n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            char c = Convert.ToChar(Console.ReadLine());
            string s1 = UserProgramCode.replaceString(str, n, c);
            if (s1 == "-1")
                Console.WriteLine("Invalid String");
            else if (s1 == "-2")
                Console.WriteLine("Number not positive");
            else if (s1 == "-3")
                Console.WriteLine("Character not a special character");
            else
                Console.WriteLine(s1);
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static string replaceString(string str, int n, char c)
        {
            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
            string[] ss = str.Split(' ');
            for (int i = 0; i < ss.Length; i++)
            {
                char[] ch1 = ss[i].ToCharArray();
                foreach (char item in ch1)
                {
                    if (!(char.IsLetter(item)))
                        return "-1";

                }
            }
            if (n < 0)
                return "-2";
            if (char.IsLetterOrDigit(c))
                return "-3";
            char[] ch = ss[n - 1].ToCharArray();
            for (int i = 0; i < ss[n - 1].Length; i++)
            {
                ch[i] = c;

            }
            string s2 = new string(ch);
            for (int i = 0; i < ss.Length; i++)
            {
                if (i == n - 1)
                {
                    sb.Append(s2);
                    sb.Append(' ');
                }
                else
                {
                    sb.Append(ss[i]);
                    sb.Append(' ');
                }
                
            }
            
            return sb.ToString();

        }
    }
}
------------------------Matching String(Q7)-----------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication28
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            List<string> l1 = new List<string>(n);
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            {
                l1.Add(Console.ReadLine());
            }
            char c = Convert.ToChar(Console.ReadLine());
            List<string> l2 = new List<string>();
            l2 = UserProgramCode.sortStrings(n, l1, c);
            if (l2[0] == "-1")
                Console.WriteLine("No match found");
            else
            {
                foreach (string item in l2)
                {
                    Console.WriteLine(item);
                }
            }
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static List<string> sortStrings(int n, List<string> l1, char c)
        {
            int f=0,j=0;
            
            string[] sb=new string[n];
            List<string> l3=new List<string>();
            List<string> l4=new List<string>();

            for (int i = 0; i < l1.Count; i++)
            {
                
                
                char[] ch = l1[i].ToLower().ToCharArray();  //Remember to check for case
                 if (ch[0] == c)
                    {
                        f++;
                        l3.Add(l1[i]);
                    }
                
            }
           if(f==0)
           l4.Add("-1");
           else
           {
               foreach (string h in l3)
               {
                  sb[j]=h+'_'+f;
                  
                  l4.Add(sb[j]);
                  j++;
                  
               }
               
               
             
           }
           return l4;

 
        }
    }
}

-----------------or------------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication28
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            List<string> l1 = new List<string>(n);
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            {
                l1.Add(Console.ReadLine());
            }
            char c = Convert.ToChar(Console.ReadLine());
            List<string> l2 = new List<string>();
            l2 = UserProgramCode.sortStrings(n, l1, c);
            if (l2[0] == "-1")
                Console.WriteLine("No match found");
            else
            {
                foreach (string item in l2)
                {
                    Console.WriteLine(item);
                }
            }
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static List<string> sortStrings(int n, List<string> l1, char c)
        {
            int f=0;
            List<string> l3 = new List<string>(n);
            List<string> l4 = new List<string>(n);
            
            foreach (string i in l1)
            {
                //char[] ch = i.ToLower().ToCharArray();
                if (i.ToLower().StartsWith("" + c))
                {
                    l3.Add(i);
                    f++;
                }

            }

            if (f == 0)
                l4[0] = "-1";
            else
            {
                foreach (string sd in l3)
                {
                    l4.Add(sd + "_" + f);
                }
            }

            return l4;


 
        }
    }
}
---------------------------Unique Counter(Q8)------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication2
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int count = 0;
            int flag = 0;
            int sum = 0;
            string s = Console.ReadLine();
            char[] s1 = s.Distinct().ToArray();
            string s3 = new string(s1);
            char[] s4 = s.ToCharArray();
            for (int i = 0; i < s1.Length; i++)
            {
                count = 0;
                for (int j = 0; j < s4.Length; j++)
                {
                    if (s1[i] == s4[j])
                    {
                        count++;
                    }

                }
                if (count == 1)
                {
                    sum++;
                }
            }
            if (sum == 0)
            {
                Console.WriteLine("Invalid");
            }
            else
            {
                Console.WriteLine(sum);
            }
            Console.ReadLine();


        }
    }
}





---------------------------Validate Voter(Q9)-------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication28
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            string l1=Console.ReadLine();
            string l2 = Console.ReadLine();

            int n = UserProgramCode.validateVoter(l1, l2);
            if(n==-1)
                Console.WriteLine("Invalid Date format");
            else if(n==1)
                Console.WriteLine("Eligible");
            else 
                Console.WriteLine("Not Eligible");
                Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static int validateVoter(string l1,string l2)
        {
            DateTime dt;
            DateTime dt1;
            bool b = DateTime.TryParseExact(l1, "MM/dd/yyyy", null, System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None, out dt);
            bool b1 = DateTime.TryParseExact(l2, "MM/dd/yyyy", null, System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None, out dt1);

            if (!(b) || !(b1))
                return -1;
            else
            {
               int t= (int)(dt1 - dt).TotalDays;
               if ((Math.Floor (t / 365.25) > 18))
                   return 1;
               else return 0;

 
             }


        }
    }
}
-------------------Calculate Telephone Bill(Q10)------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication8
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int a = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            double d = UserProgramCode.calculateTelephoneBill(a);
            Console.WriteLine(d);
            Console.ReadLine();



        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static double calculateTelephoneBill(int a)
        {
            
            double d1=0;
            if (a <= 300)
                d1 = 200;
            else if (a > 300 && a <= 350)
                d1 = 200 + (0.60 * (a - 300));
            else if (a > 350 && a <= 400)
                d1 = 200 + 0.60 * 50 + (0.50 * (a - 350));
            else
                d1 = 200 + 0.60 * 50 + 0.50 * 50 + (0.40 * (a - 400));
            d1= Math.Round(d1,2);
            return d1;

        }
    }
}

---------------------------------Vowels(Q11)-----------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication28
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            string l1 = Console.ReadLine();
            int n = UserProgramCode.testVowels(l1);
            if (n == 1)
                Console.WriteLine("valid");
            else
                Console.WriteLine("invalid");
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static int testVowels(string l1)
        {
            int count = 0;
            for (int i = 0; i < l1.Length; i++)
            {
                if (l1[i] == 'a' || l1[i] == 'e' || l1[i] == 'o' || l1[i] == 'i' || l1[i] == 'u')
                    count++;

            }
            if (count == 5)
                return 1;
            else
                return -1;
        }
    }
}
-------------------------------removeTens(Q12)-----------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication28
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            int[] a1 = new int[n];
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            {
                a1[i] = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            }
            int[] a2=new int[n];
            a2 = UserProgramCode.removeTens(a1, n);
            for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)
            {
                Console.WriteLine(a2[j]);
            }
            
                Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static int[] removeTens(int[] a1,int n)
        {

            int j=0;
            int[] a3 = new int[n];
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            {
                if (a1[i] != 10)
                {
                    a3[j] = a1[i];
                    j++;
                }
            }
            for (int k = j; k < n; k++)
            {
                a3[k] = 0;
            }
               
            
            return a3;
            
        }
    }
}
-------------------------------------Next Year Day(Q13)-----------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication28
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            string str = Console.ReadLine();
            string str1 = UserProgramCode.nextYearDay(str);
            Console.WriteLine(str1);

  
            
                Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static string nextYearDay(string str)
        {
            DateTime dt;
            DateTime dt1;
            string s="";
            bool b = DateTime.TryParseExact(str, "dd/MM/yyyy", null, System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None, out dt);
            
            
            if (b)
            {
                dt1=dt.AddYears(1);
                s=dt1.DayOfWeek.ToString();
            }
            return s;
        }
    }
}
-------------------------------Validating the pan(Q14)---------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Text.RegularExpressions;

namespace ConsoleApplication28
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            string str = Console.ReadLine();
            int n = UserProgramCode.validatePAN(str);
            if(n==1)
                Console.WriteLine("Valid PAN code");
            else
                Console.WriteLine("Invalid PAN code");
                Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static int validatePAN(string str)
        {
            Regex rex = new Regex(@"^[A-Z]{3}[0-9]{4}[A-Z]$");
            if(rex.IsMatch(str))
                return 1;
            else
                return 2;
        }
    }
}
-----------------------------Validate Password(Q15)---------------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Text.RegularExpressions;

namespace ConsoleApplication28
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            string str = Console.ReadLine();
            int n = UserProgramCode.validatePassword(str);
            if(n==1)
                Console.WriteLine("Valid Password");
            else
                Console.WriteLine("Invalid Password");
                Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static int validatePassword(string str)
        {
            Regex rex = new Regex(@"^[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9@_#][A-Za-z0-9]{8}$");
            if(rex.IsMatch(str))
                return 1;
            else
                return 2;
        }
    }
}
----------------------Sort the list(Q16**)----------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication10
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            List<string> str = new List<string>(n);
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            {
                str.Add(Console.ReadLine());
            }
            char ch = Convert.ToChar(Console.ReadLine());
            List<string> str1 = new List<string>(n);
            str1 = UserProgramCode.GetTheElements(str, ch);
            for (int i = 0; i < str1.Count; i++)
            {
                Console.WriteLine(str1[i]);
            }
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static List<String> GetTheElements(List<string> str,char ch)
        {
            int count = 0;
            int f = 0;
            List<string> str2 = new List<string>(str.Count);
            //List<string> str3 = new List<string>(str.Count);
            for (int i = 0; i < str.Count; i++)
            {
                char[] c=new char[str[i].Length];
                c=str[i].ToCharArray();
                for (int j = 0; j <c.Length ; j++)
                {
                    if (!(char.IsLetter(c[j])))
                    {
                        f++; ;
                    } 
                }
                
            }
            for (int i = 0; i < str.Count; i++)
            {
                if (!(str[i].ToLower().StartsWith(ch.ToString())))
                    str2.Add(str[i]);
                else
                    count++;
            }
            if (f != 0)
                str2.Add("Invalid Input");
            else if (count == str.Count)
                str2.Add("List Is Empty");

            return str2;    

        }
    }
}
------------------------Convert Format(Q17)--------------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication10
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            string str = Console.ReadLine();
            string str1 = UserProgramCode.convertFormat(str);
            Console.WriteLine(str1);
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static string convertFormat(string str)
        {
            string str2="";
            str2 = str.Substring(0, 2) + '-' + str.Substring(2, 1) + str.Substring(4, 1) + '-' + str.Substring(5, 2) + str.Substring(8, 1) + '-' + str.Substring(9,3);
            return str2;
        }
    }
}
-----------------------------------Common Characters(Q18**)--------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication10
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            string s1 = Console.ReadLine();
            string s2 = Console.ReadLine();
            int n = UserProgramCode.commonChars(s1, s2);
            Console.WriteLine(n);
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static int commonChars(string s1, string s2)
        {
            int count = 0;
            char[] c1 = s1.ToLower().ToCharArray();
            char[] d1 = c1.Distinct().ToArray();
            char[] c2 = s2.ToLower().ToCharArray();
            char[] d2 = c2.Distinct().ToArray();
            for (int i = 0; i < d1.Length; i++)
            {
                for (int j = 0; j < d2.Length; j++)
                {
                    if (d1[i] == d2[j])
                    {
                        if (d1[i] != ' ')
                        {
                            count++;
                        }
                    }
                }

            }
            return count;
        }
    }
}


---------------------------------Sum of Odd Even Positioned(Q19)-------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication10
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            
            int n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            int s = UserProgramCode.sumOfOddEvenPositioned(n);
            if(s==1)
                Console.WriteLine("valid");
            else
                Console.WriteLine("Not Valid");
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static int sumOfOddEvenPositioned(int n)
        {
            int odd = 0, even = 0;
            string a = n.ToString();
            for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++)
            {
                if (i % 2 == 0)
                    odd = odd + a[i];
                else
                    even = even + a[i];
            }
            if (odd == even)
                return 1;
            else
                return 2;
        }
    }
}
-------------------------------------printCapitalized(Q20)-------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication10
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            string s = Console.ReadLine();
            string s1 = UserProgramCode.printCapitalized(s);
            Console.WriteLine(s1);
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static string printCapitalized(string s)
        {
            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
           string[] ss= s.Split(' ');
           for (int i = 0; i < ss.Length; i++)
           {
               char[] ch=ss[i].ToLower().ToCharArray();
               ch[0]= char.ToUpper(ch[0]);
               string str = new string(ch);
               sb.Append(str);
               sb.Append(' ');
           }
           string s2 = sb.ToString();
          return s2;
        }
    }
}

-----------------------------------Dash Check(Q21**)-------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication10
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            string s1 = Console.ReadLine();
            string s2 = Console.ReadLine();
            int n = UserProgramCode.compareDashes(s1, s2);

            if(n==1)
                Console.WriteLine("Yes");
            else
                Console.WriteLine("No");

            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static int compareDashes(string s1,string s2)
        {
            int count = 0;
            for (int i = 0; i < s1.Length; i++)
            {
                for (int j = 0; j < s2.Length; j++)
                {

                    if (i == j)
                    {
                        if (s1[i] == '-' && s2[j] == '-')
                            count = 1;
                        else
                            count = 0;
                        
                    }
                    else
                    {
                        count = 0;
                    }
                }
            }
            if (count != 0)
                return 1;
            else
                return 2;
        }
    }
}

-------------------------------Calculate Bill Amount(Q22)------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication30
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            double d = Convert.ToDouble(Console.ReadLine());
            char c = Convert.ToChar(Console.ReadLine());
            int n = UserProgramCode.calculateBillAmount(d,c);
            if(n==-1)
                Console.WriteLine("Negative Values");
            else if(n==-2)
                Console.WriteLine("No Items");
            else
                Console.WriteLine(n);
            Console.ReadLine();

        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        
        public static int calculateBillAmount(double d,char c)
        {
            double dp=0;
            if (d < 0)
                return -1;
            else
            {
                if (!(c == 'T' || c == 'M'))
                    return -2;
                else
                {
                    
                    if (c == 'T')
                    {
                        if (d >= 1 && d <= 25000)
                            dp = (5.00 / 100.00) * d;
                        else if (d >= 25001 && d <= 50000)
                            dp = (10.00 / 100.00) * d;
                        else if (d > 50000)
                            dp = d*(15.00/100.00);
                        
                    }
                    else
                    {
                        if (d >= 1 && d <= 25000)
                            dp = (10.00 / 100.00) * d;
                        if (d >= 25001 && d <= 50000)
                            dp = (20.00 / 100.00) * d;
                        if (d > 50000)
                            dp = (30.00 / 100.00) * d;
                        
                    }
                }
            }

            
         return (int)(d - dp); 
            
        }
    }
}


--------------------------------Add and Reverse(Q23)----------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication1
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            int[] a = new int[n];
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            {
                a[i] = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            }
            int k = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            int o = UserProgramCode.addAndReverse(a,k);
            Console.WriteLine(o);
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static int addAndReverse(int[] a,int k)
        {
            int sum = 0;
            int rev=0;
            Array.Sort(a);

            for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++)
            {
                if (a[i] > k)
                    sum = sum + a[i];
            }
            while (sum != 0)
            {
                int r = sum % 10;
                rev = rev * 10 + r;
                sum = sum / 10;
            }
            return rev;
        }
    }
}
-------------------------------Sum Non Prime Numbers(Q24)---------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication10
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            int n1 = UserProgramCode.addNumbers(n);
            Console.WriteLine(n1);
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static int addNumbers(int n)
        {
            int k = 0,sum1=0;
            for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
            {
                k = 0;
                for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++)
			    {
                    if (i % j == 0)
                        k++;
			 
			    }
                if (k == 2)
                {
                    //this is the condition for checking the prime numbers
                }
                else
                {
                    sum1 = sum1 + i;
                }
               
            }
           
            return sum1;
        }
    }
}

-------------------------------Calculate VAT(Q25)------------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication30
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            char c = Convert.ToChar(Console.ReadLine());
            double d = Convert.ToDouble(Console.ReadLine());
            double vat = UserProgramCode.calculateVAT(c,d);
            if(vat==-1)
                Console.WriteLine("Invalid Input");
            else
            Console.WriteLine(vat);
            Console.ReadLine();

        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static double calculateVAT(char c,double d)
        {
            double v=0.00;
            if (!(c == 'M' || c == 'V' || c == 'C' || c == 'E'))
                return -1;
            else
            {
                if (d < 0)
                    return -1;
                else
                {
                    if (c == 'M')
                        v = (9 / 100.00) * d;
                    else if (c == 'V')
                        v = (5 / 100.00) * d;
                    else if (c == 'C')
                        v = (12 / 100.00) * d;
                    else if (c == 'E')
                        v = (6.25 / 100.00) * d;

 
                }
            }
            
            return v;


        }
    }
}
------------------------------------Calculate Take Home Salary(Q26)---------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication30
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            
            int a = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            int sal = UserProgramCode.calculateVAT(a);
            if(sal==-1)
                Console.WriteLine("Invalid Input");
            else
            Console.WriteLine(sal);
            Console.ReadLine();

        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static int calculateVAT(int a)
        {
            int ths = 0;
            
                if (a < 0)
                    return -1;
                else
                {
                    if (a <= 15000)
                        ths = a - 750 - 678;
                    else if (a > 15000 && a <= 22000)
                        ths = a - 850 - 678;
                    else if (a > 20000 && a <= 30000)
                        ths = a - 925 - 678;
                    else if (a > 30000)
                        ths = a - 1000 - 678;
                }
            
            
            return ths;


        }
    }
}
--------------------------------------Count Sequential Characters(Q27)-----------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication30
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            string s = Console.ReadLine();
            int n = UserProgramCode.countSequentialChars(s);
            Console.WriteLine(n);
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static int countSequentialChars(string s)
        {
            int flag = 0,k=0;
            char[] ch = s.ToCharArray();
            for (int i = 0; i < ch.Length - 2; i++)
            {
                
                if (ch[i] == ch[i + 1])
                {
                    if (ch[i] == ch[i + 2])
                    {
                        flag = 1; 
                        k++;
                    }
                    
                }
            }
            if (flag == 0)
                return -1;
            else
                return k;
        }
    }
}
-----------------------------Extract Max Substring(Q28)---------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication30
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            string s1 = Console.ReadLine();
            string s2 = Console.ReadLine();
            string n = UserProgramCode.extractMax(s1, s2);
            Console.WriteLine(n);
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static string extractMax(string s1, string s2)
        {
            int max = 0;
            int var = 0;
            char c = char.Parse(s2);
            string[] ss = s1.Split(c);
            max = ss[0].Length;
            for (int i = 0; i < ss.Length; i++)
            {
                if (ss[i].Length > max)
                {
                    max = ss[i].Length;
                    var = i;
                }
            }
            return ss[var];

        }
    }
}
---------------------------Arrange After Cubing(Q29)-----------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication30
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            int[] a = new int[n];
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            {
                a[i] = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            }
            int[] b=new int[100];
            b = UserProgramCode.arrangeAfterCubing(a);
            for (int i = 0; i < b.Length; i++)
            {
                Console.WriteLine(b[i]);
            }
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static int[] arrangeAfterCubing(int[] a)
        {
            int flag=0;
            List<int> c=new List<int>();
            for (int j = 0; j < a.Length; j++)
            {
                if (a[j] < 0)
                    flag = 1;
            }
               if(flag==0)
                {
                    for (int i = 0; i < a.Length - 1; i++)
                    {
                        if (a[i] < a[i + 1])
                        {
                            if (a[i + 1] == a[i] * a[i])
                            {
                                c.Add(a[i]);
                                c.Add(a[i] * a[i] * a[i]);
                            }
                            else
                                c.Add(a[i]);

                        }
                        else c.Add(a[i]);
                    }
                   c.Add(a[a.Length - 1]);
                }
               else
               {
                   for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++)
                   {
                       if (a[i] > 0)
                           c.Add(a[i]);
                       else
                           c.Add(a[i] * a[i]);
                   }

               }
           return c.ToArray();
        }
    }
}
--------------Find Leaders(Q30){do it for checking repetitive elsements}-------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication30
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            int[] a = new int[n];
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            {
                a[i] = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            }
            List<int> b = new List<int>(n);
            b = UserProgramCode.findLeadersArray(a);
            for (int i = 0; i < b.Count; i++)
            {
                Console.WriteLine(b[i]);
            }
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static List<int> findLeadersArray(int[] a)
        {
            int flag=0;
            List<int> c = new List<int>(a.Length);
            List<int> d = new List<int>(a.Length);
            
            for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++)
            {
                if (a[i] < 0)
                {
                    d.Add(-1);
                    return d;
                }
                else if (a.Length < 2 || a.Length > 10)
                {
                    d.Add(-2);
                    return d;
                }

                else
                    c.Add(a[i]);
            }
            
            for (int i = 0; i < c.Count-1; i++)
            {
                flag = 0;
                for (int j = i+1; j < c.Count; j++)
	        {
                     if (c[i] < c[j])
                         flag = 1;
                }
                if (flag == 0)
                    d.Add(c[i]);
            }
           

            d.Add(c[c.Count - 1]);
            d.Sort();
            return d;
        }
    }
}
-------------------Validate String(Q31)-------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication30
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            string str = Console.ReadLine();
            int n = UserProgramCode.validateString(str);
            Console.WriteLine(n);
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static int validateString(string str)
        {
            int m=0;
            char[] ch=str.ToCharArray();
            if (ch.Length != 4)
                m = -1;
            else if (!(char.IsDigit(ch[0]) || char.IsLetter(ch[0])))
                m = -2;
            else if (!(char.IsLetter(ch[1]) && char.IsUpper(ch[1])))
                m = -3;
            else if (char.IsNumber(ch[2]))
            {
                if (!(ch[2] >='5' && ch[2] <= '9'))
                    m = -4;
                else
                    m = 1;
            }
           

            return m;
        }
    }
}
------------------------Digit Sum in String Array(Q32)-----------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication30
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            string[] a = new string[n];
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            {
                a[i] = Console.ReadLine();
            }
            int m = UserProgramCode.sumOfDigits(a);
            Console.WriteLine(m);
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static int sumOfDigits(string[] a)
        {
            int b = 0,sum=0;
            for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++)
            {
                char[] ch = a[i].ToCharArray();
                for (int j = 0; j < ch.Length; j++)
                {
                    if (!(char.IsLetterOrDigit(ch[j])))
                        b = -1;
                    else
                    {
                        if (char.IsDigit(ch[j]))
                        {
                            sum = sum + ch[j];
                            sum = sum - 48;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            return sum;
            
        }
    }
}
-----------------------------Symmetric Difference(Q33**)---------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication30
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            int[] a = new int[n];
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            {
                a[i] = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            }
            int m = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            int[] b = new int[m];
            for (int i = 0; i < m; i++)
            {
                b[i] = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            }
            int[] c = new int[100];
            c = UserProgramCode.symmetricDifference(a, b);
            foreach (int item in c)
            {
                Console.WriteLine(item);
            }


            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static int[] symmetricDifference(int[] a, int[] b)
        {
            int[] d = a.Union(b).ToArray();
            int[] e = a.Intersect(b).ToArray();
            int[] f = d.Except(e).ToArray();
            for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++)
            {
                if (a[i] < 0)
                    f[0] = -1;
            }
            for (int j = 0; j < b.Length; j++)
            {
                if (b[j] < 0)
                    f[0] = -2;
            }


            Array.Sort(f);
            return f;
        }
    }
}
---------------------------Count Even Occurrence(Q34**)----------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication30
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            int[] a = new int[n];
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            {
                a[i] = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            }
            int count = UserProgramCode.countEvenOccurence(a);
            Console.WriteLine(count);
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static int countEvenOccurence(int[] a)
        {
            int count,flag=0;
            for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++)
            {
                if (a[i] < 0)
                    flag = -1;
            }
            for (int i = 0; i < a.Length-1; i++)
            {
                count = 0;
                for (int j = i+1; j < a.Length; j++)
                {

                    if (a[i] == a[j])
                        count++;
                }
                if (count % 2 == 0)
                    flag++;
            }
            
            
            
            return flag;
        }
    }
}
----------------------------Repeated Words(Q35)------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication31
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            string a = Console.ReadLine();
            string b = Console.ReadLine();
            string c = UserProgramCode.repeatedWords(a, b);
            Console.WriteLine(c);
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static string repeatedWords(string a, string b)
        {
            int count = 0, max = 0, flag = 0,count1=0;
            a.ToLower();
            b.ToLower();
            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
            string[] ss1 = a.Split(' ');
            string[] ss2 = b.Split(' ');
            for (int i = 0; i < ss1.Length - 1; i++)
            {
                for (int j = i + 1; j < ss1.Length; j++)
                {
                    if (ss1[i] == ss1[j])
                        return "-1";
                }
            }
            for (int i = 0; i < ss1.Length; i++)
            {
                count1 = 0;
                for (int j = 0; j < ss2.Length; j++)
                {
                    if (ss1[i] == ss2[j])
                        count1++;

                }
                if (count1 >= max)
                {
                    max = count1;
                }
            }
            for (int i = 0; i < ss1.Length; i++)
            {
                count = 0;
                for (int j = 0; j < ss2.Length; j++)
                {

                    if (ss1[i] == ss2[j])
                    {
                        count++;
                        flag = 1;
                    }

                }
                if (count == max)
                {
                    max = count;
                    sb.Append(ss1[i]);
                    sb.Append(' ');
                }
            }
            if (flag == 0)
                return "-2";
            else
                return sb.ToString().Trim(' ');

        }
    }
}
--------------------------Count Subsets(Q36)----------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication31
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            int[] a = new int[n];
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            {
                a[i] = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            }
            int m = UserProgramCode.countSubsets(a);
            Console.WriteLine(m);
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static int countSubsets(int[] a)
        {
            int count = 0;
            int flag = 0;
            Array.Sort(a);
            for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++)
            {
                if (a[i] < 0)
                    return -2;
            }
            for (int i = 0; i < a.Length-1; i++)
            {
                for (int j = i+1; j < a.Length; j++)
                {
                    if (a[i] == a[j])
                        flag = 1;
                }
            }
            for (int i = 0; i < a.Length-2; i++)
            {
                for (int j = i+1; j < a.Length-1; j++)
                {
                    for (int k = i+2; k < a.Length; k++)
                    {
                        if ((a[i] + a[j]) == a[k])
                            count++;
                    }
                }
            }
            if (flag == 1)
                return -3;
            else if (count == 0)
                return -1;
            else
                return count;

            
               
        }
    }
}
--------------------Identify Perfect Numbers(Q37)-------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication31
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            int[] a = new int[n];
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            {
                a[i] = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            }
            int[] c = new int[n];
            c = UserProgramCode.perfectNum(a);
            foreach (int item in c)
            {
                Console.WriteLine(item);
            }
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        
        public static int[] perfectNum(int[] a)
        {
            int sum = 0;
            int flag=0;
            int flag1=0;
            List<int> ll=new List<int>(a.Length);
            for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++)
            {
                if (a[i] < 0)
                    flag = 1;
            }
            for (int i = 0; i < a.Length-1; i++)
            {
                for (int j = i+1; j < a.Length; j++)
                {
                    if(a[i]==a[j])
                    flag1=1;
                }
            }
            if (flag == 1)
            {
                ll.Add(-1);
                return ll.ToArray(); ;
            }
            else if (flag1 == 1)
            {
                ll.Add(-2);
                return ll.ToArray();
            }
            else if (a.Length == 1 || a.Length > 7)
            {
                ll.Add(-3);
                return ll.ToArray();
            }
            else
            {
                for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++)
                {
                    sum = 0;
                    for (int j = 1; j < a[i]; j++)
                    {
                        if ((a[i] % j) == 0)
                            sum = sum + j;
                    }
                    if (!(sum == a[i]))
                        ll.Add(a[i]);

                }


                return ll.ToArray();
            }
        }
    }
}
---------------------------Quadratic Equation(Q38)--------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication31
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            int[] a = new int[n];
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            {
                a[i] = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            }
            int[] c = new int[n];
            c = UserProgramCode.perfectNum(a);
            foreach (int item in c)
            {
                Console.WriteLine(item);
            }
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        
        public static int[] perfectNum(int[] a)
        {
          
            int y, z;
            int flag=0;
            int flag1=0;
            List<int> ll=new List<int>(a.Length);
            for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++)
            {
                if (a[i] < 0)
                    flag = 1;
            }
            for (int i = 0; i < a.Length-1; i++)
            {
                for (int j = i+1; j < a.Length; j++)
                {
                    if(a[i]==a[j])
                    flag1=1;
                }
            }
            if (flag == 1)
            {
                ll.Add(-1);
                return ll.ToArray(); ;
            }
            else if (flag1 == 1)
            {
                ll.Add(-2);
                return ll.ToArray();
            }
            else if (a.Length == 1 || a.Length > 10)
            {
                ll.Add(-3);
                return ll.ToArray();
            }
            else
            {
                for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++)
                {
                    y = 40 - a[i] * a[i];
                    ll.Add(y);
                    z = 80 - 3 * (a[i] * a[i]);
                    ll.Add(z);
                }


                return ll.ToArray();
            }
        }
    }
}
------------------------Interleaved Words(Q39)----------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication31
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            string a = Console.ReadLine();
            string b = Console.ReadLine();
            string c = Console.ReadLine();
            string d = UserProgramCode.checkInterleavedword(a, b, c);
            if(d=="1")
                Console.WriteLine("{0} is a interleaved word of {1} and {2} together",c,a,b);
            else
            Console.WriteLine(d);
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {

        public static string checkInterleavedword(string a, string b, string c)
        {
            int flag = 0,count=0;
            int flag1 = 0,count1=0;
            string f="";
            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
            if(a==b)
                return "-2";
            char[] ch1 = a.ToCharArray();
            char[] ch2 = b.ToCharArray();
            for (int i = 0; i < ch1.Length; i++)
            {
                if(char.IsDigit(ch1[i]))
                flag = 1;
                if (!(char.IsLetterOrDigit(ch1[i])))
                    count = 1;
            }
            for (int j = 0; j < ch2.Length; j++)
            {
                if(char.IsDigit(ch2[j]))
                flag1 = 1;
                if (!(char.IsLetterOrDigit(ch2[j])))
                    count1 = 1;
            }

            if (flag == 1 || flag1 == 1)
                return "-1";
            else if (count == 1 || count1 == 1)
                return "-3";
            else
            {
                sb.Append(a);
                sb.Append(b);
                string e = sb.ToString();
                if (e == c)
                    f = "1";

                return f;
            }
        }
    }
}
----------------------------TRIPLETS(Q40)-------------------------

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication4
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n;
            n = Int32.Parse(Console.ReadLine());
            int[] ar = new int[n];
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            {
                ar[i] = Int32.Parse(Console.ReadLine());
            }
            Array.Sort(ar);
            int no = Int32.Parse(Console.ReadLine());
            int f = 0;
            for (int i = 0; i < ar.Length - 1; i++)
            {
                int j = i + 1;
                int k = ar.Length - 1;
                while (j < k)
                {
                    if ((ar[i] + ar[j] + ar[k]) == no)
                    {
                        Console.WriteLine(ar[i] + " " + ar[j] + " " + ar[k]);
                        f = 1;
                        break;
                    }
                    else if (ar[i] + ar[j] + ar[k] < no)
                        j++;
                    else
                        k--;
                }
                if (f == 1)
                    break;
            }
            if (f == 0)
                Console.WriteLine("No such combination");

            Console.Read();
        }
    }
}
---------------------------------Max Diff in Array(Q41)-------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication31
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            int[] a = new int[n];
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            {
                a[i] = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            }
            int d = UserProgramCode.diffIntArray(a);
            Console.WriteLine(d);
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {

        public static int diffIntArray(int[] a)
        {
            int diff = 0,flag=0,flag1=0;
            for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++)
            {
                if (a[i] < 0)
                    flag = 1;
            }
            for (int i = 0; i < a.Length-1; i++)
            {
                for (int j = i+1; j < a.Length; j++)
                {
                    if (a[i] == a[j])
                        flag1 = 1;
                }
            }
            if (flag == 1)
                return -1;
            else if (flag1 == 1)
                return -3;
            else if (a.Length == 1 || a.Length > 10)
                return -2;
            else
            {
                for (int i = 0; i < a.Length - 1; i++)
                {
                    for (int j = 0; j < a.Length; j++)
                    {
                        if ((a[j] - a[i]) > diff)
                        {
                            diff = a[j] - a[i];
                        }
                    }
                }
                return diff;
            
            }
        }
    }
}
---------------------------------Vehicle Mileage(Q42)-----------------

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication61
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n1=Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            int n2=Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            double d=UserProgramCode.findMileage(n1,n2);
            if(d==-1)
                Console.WriteLine("Invalid caliber");
            else if(d==-2)
                Console.WriteLine("Invalid years");
            else
            Console.WriteLine("The mileage of the bike is {0}",d);

            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode 
    {
        public static double findMileage(int n1, int n2)
        {
            double m = 0;
            if (n1 < 0 || n1<100)
                return -1;
            else if (n1 >= 100 && n1 < 125)
                m = 75;
            else if (n1 >= 126 && n1 < 135)
                m = 70;
            else if (n1 >= 136 && n1 < 150)
                m = 60;
            else if (n1 >= 151 && n1 < 200)
                m = 50;
            else if (n1 >= 201 && n1 < 220)
                m = 35;

            if (n2 < 0 || n2 > 20)
               return -2;
            else if (n2 > 0 && n2 <= 2)
                m = m - 0.1 * m;
            else if (n2 > 2 && n2 <= 4)
                m = m - 0.15 * m;
            else if (n2 > 4)
                m = m - 0.2 * m;

            return m;
        }
    }
}


---------------------------------Bonus Calculation(Q43)---------------

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication61
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n1=Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            int n2 = UserProgramCode.calculateBonus(n1);
            Console.WriteLine(n2);
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode 
    {
        public static int calculateBonus(int n1)
        {
            int b=0;
            if (n1 < 0)
                return -1;
            else if (n1 > 1000000)
                return -2;
            else if (n1 > 15000 && n1 < 20001)
                b = (int)(0.17 * n1 + 1500);
            else if (n1 > 10000 && n1 < 15001)
                b = (int)(0.15 * n1 + 1200);
            else if (n1 < 10001)
                b = (int)(0.12 * n1 + 1000);
            else
                b = (int)(0.08 * n1 + 500);

            return b;
        }
    }
}


---------------------------------Password Encryption(Q44)-------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication7
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            string a = Console.ReadLine();
            string b = Console.ReadLine();
            string c = UserProgramCode.replaceChar(a, b);
            Console.WriteLine(c);
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static string replaceChar(String a, String b)
        {
            string f = "";
            if (a.Length == 0)
            {
                return "Invalid Password ";
            }
            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
            string[] ss = a.Split(' ');
            char[] ch1 = b.ToCharArray();
            for (int i = 0; i < ss.Length; i++)
            {
                char[] ch = ss[i].ToCharArray();

                if (ch[0].ToString() == b)
                {
                    sb.Append(Convert.ToChar(ch1[0] + 1));
                    sb.Append('#');
                    for (int j = 1; j < ss[i].Length; j++)
                    {
                        sb.Append(ch[j]);
                    }
                    sb.Append(' ');

                }
                else
                {
                    sb.Append(b);
                    for (int j = 1; j < ss[i].Length; j++)
                    {
                        sb.Append(ch[j]);
                    }
                    sb.Append(' ');
                }
            }
            f = sb.ToString();
            return f;
        }
    }
}
----------------------------------GCD – Array(Q45)-------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication7
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            int[] a = new int[n];
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            {
                a[i] = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            }
            int m = UserProgramCode.greatestCommonDivisor(a);
            Console.WriteLine(m);
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static int greatestCommonDivisor(int[] a)
        {   int flag=0,n=0,s=0;
           
        for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++)
        {
            if (a[i] < 1)
                return -1;
        }
         for (n = a.Min(); n >0; n--)
         {
             flag = 0;
             for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++)
                {
                    if (a[i] % n == 0)
                     flag++;
                }
             if (flag == a.Length)
                {
                     s = n;
                      return s;
                      
                }
          }
                return 1;

            
            
        }
    }
}
----------------------------Sort String(Q46)------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication7
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            List<string> a = new List<string>(n);
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            {
                a.Add(Console.ReadLine());
            }
            List<string> b = new List<string>(n);
            b = UserProgramCode.sortString(a);
            foreach (string item in b)
            {
                Console.WriteLine(b);
            }
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static List<string> sortString(List<string> a)
        {
            int flag=0;
            List<string> c = new List<string>(a.Count);
            for (int i = 0; i < a.Count; i++)
            {
                char[] ch=a[i].ToCharArray();
                Array.Sort(ch);
                for (int j = 0; j < ch.Length-1; j++)
                {
                    for (int k = j+1; k < ch.Length; k++)
                    {
                        char.ToLower(ch[k]);
                        if(ch[j]==ch[k])
                            flag=1
                    }

                }
            }
        }
    }
}
-------------------------Duplicate Date Elements(Q47)-------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication1
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            string[] s = new string[n];
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            {
                s[i] = Console.ReadLine();
            }
            List<string> a = new List<string>(n);
            a = UserProgramCode.removeDuplicateDate(s);
            foreach (string item in a)
            {
                Console.WriteLine(item);
            }
            Console.ReadLine();

        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static List<string> removeDuplicateDate(string[] a)
        {
            List<string> ll = new List<string>(a.Length);
            List<string> ll2 = new List<string>(a.Length);
            DateTime dt, dt1, dt2, dt3;
            for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++)
            {
                bool b = DateTime.TryParseExact(a[i], "dd-MM-yyyy", null, System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None, out dt);
                bool b1 = DateTime.TryParseExact(a[i], "dd/MM/yyyy", null, System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None, out dt1);
                bool b2 = DateTime.TryParseExact(a[i], "dd.MM.yyyy", null, System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None, out dt2);
                bool b3 = DateTime.TryParseExact(a[i], "dd-MMMM-yyyy", null, System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None, out dt3);
                if (!(b1 || b2 || b3 || b))
                {
                    ll2.Add("Invalid Date");
                    return ll2;
                }
                else if (b)
                {
                    string s = dt.Date.ToString("dd/MM/yyyy");

                    ll.Add(s);
                }
                else if (b1)
                {
                    string s1 = dt1.Date.ToString("dd/MM/yyyy");

                    ll.Add(s1);
                }
                else if (b2)
                {
                    string s2 = dt2.Date.ToString("dd/MM/yyyy");

                    ll.Add(s2);
                }
                else if (b3)
                {
                    string s3 = dt3.Date.ToString("dd/MM/yyyy");

                    ll.Add(s3);
                }
            }
            string[] ash = ll.Distinct().ToArray();
            foreach (string item in ash)
            {
                ll2.Add(item);
            }
            return ll2;
        }
    }
}
---------------------------------------Train Tariff Calculation(Q48)--------------

---------------------------------------Array Median(Q50)----------------------
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication1
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            int[] a = new int[n];
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            {
                a[i] = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            }
            int m = UserProgramCode.calculateMedian(a);
            Console.WriteLine(m);
            Console.ReadLine();

        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static int calculateMedian(int[] a)
        {
            Array.Sort(a);
            double med=0;
            int med1 = 0;
            int m=a.Length/2;
            int o=(a.Length+1)/2;
            for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++)
            {
                if (a[i] < 0)
                    return -1;
                if (a[i] == 0)
                    return -2;
            }

            if (a.Length % 2 == 0)
            {

                med = (a[m-1] + a[m]) / 2;
                med1=(int)Math.Round(med);
            }
            else
                med = a[o];

            return med1;
        }
    }
}'

--------------------------------------Relative Order(Q52)----------------------

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication7
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int n1 = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            int[] a1=new int[n1];
            for (int i = 0; i < n1; i++)
			{
			 a1[i]=Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
			}
            int n2 = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            int[] a2=new int[n2];
            for (int i = 0; i < n2; i++)
			{
			 a2[i]=Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
			}
            int[] a3=new int[100];
            a3=UserProgramCode.relativeOrder(a1,a2);
            for (int i = 0; i < a3.Length; i++)
			{
			 Console.WriteLine(a3[i]);
			}
            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
    class UserProgramCode
    {
        public static int[] relativeOrder(int[] a1, int[] a2)
        {
            List<int> ll = new List<int>();
            List<int> ll1 = new List<int>();
            List<int> ll2 = new List<int>();
            for (int i = 0; i < a2.Length; i++)
            {
                for (int j = 0; j < a1.Length; j++)
			    {
                    if (a1[j] == a2[i])
                    {
                        ll1.Add(a1[j]);
                    }
			    }
                
            }
            for (int k = 0; k < a1.Length; k++)
            {
                if(!(ll1.Contains(a1[k])))
                    ll2.Add(a1[k]);
            }
           ll2.Sort();
           for (int i = 0; i < ll1.Count; i++)
           {
                ll.Add(ll1[i]);    
           }
           for (int j = 0; j < ll2.Count; j++)
           {
               ll.Add(ll2[j]);
           }

            return ll.ToArray();
        }
    }
}

-------------------------------------Berth Type(Q53)---------------------------
